pinyin: wu3 qi4 ke3 yong4 wu4 zhi4

definition: material and spiritual culture/matter and mind/material progress, ideology and culture (philosophic slogan, adopted into Deng Xiaoping theory from 1978)
pinyin: wu4 zhi4 wen2 ming2 he2 jing1 shen2 wen2 ming2
Fei1 wu4 zhi4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

sentences.english: What is the importance of the test of related substances for antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 試述抗生素藥物有關物質檢查的意義？

sentences.english: The volatile substance contained a little of sesquiterpenes and diterpenoids.
sentences.chinese: 同時含有少量倍半萜和二萜類物質。

sentences.english: Mosquito bites can be prevented by spraying the body with a chemical containing DEET.
sentences.chinese: 蚊蟲叮咬，可阻止含有避蚊胺噴灑化學物質的身體。

sentences.english: The two fish of Pisces show Christianity's split between spirit and matter.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚宮的兩條魚表明基督教的靈性與物質的分離。

sentences.english: Which kind of resources are used in Biomass energy projects?
sentences.chinese: 生物質能項目中會用到哪些資源？

sentences.english: The estimated six to seven thousand languages spoken around the globe are the repository of our collective memory and intangible heritage.
sentences.chinese: 這六七千種語言承載者我們共同的回憶和非物質遺產。

sentences.english: All the symmetry restoring at high temperature are demonstrated to be the second order phase transitions.
sentences.chinese: 從這裏確定奇異強子物質的汽液相變是二級相變。

sentences.english: Some substances expand when hearted and contract when cooled.
The liquid solution is used for nuclear fuel in the solution reactor.
sentences.chinese: 溶液堆使用裂變物質的水溶液爲核燃料。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海帶攝取的營養物質和海帶多糖的量極少。

sentences.english: As a result, the broth of Cordyceps militaris fermentation contained antimicrobial active substances.
sentences.chinese: 蛹蟲草發酵液中具有抗菌活性物質。

sentences.english: These substances leak from the rusty barrels and pollute soil.
sentences.chinese: 這些物質從生鏽的桶中滲出然後污染了土壤。

sentences.english: Shen Zou operates mines in China that excavate fluorite and other minerals.
sentences.chinese: 申走在中國經營螢石礦，挖掘和其他礦物質。

sentences.english: Marxism believes in the primacy of matter.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義相信物質是第一性的。

sentences.english: Or was it something in the expensive bottled water in Beverly Hills where Oscar organizers are based.
sentences.chinese: 也許是因爲貝弗利山昂貴的瓶裝水中有些莫名物質。

sentences.english: Donkey milk also has anti-allergen properties and is just 1% fat.
sentences.chinese: 驢奶還含有抗過敏物質，而且脂肪含量僅佔1%。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
